name: 翻譯學理論研究
description: This course is designed to provide an overview of translation studies as an academic discipline and investigate the issues that translation studies is concerned. It is predominantly theoretical, though examples from actual translation practice will be used. The primary aim of this course is not to produce competent practicing translators. But it is hoped that the theory will help students to be more critical of being a translator and understanding the task of translation.
goals: To help students to be more critical of being a translator and understanding the task of translation.
syllabus:
本課程實務與理論並用。學生將翻譯數篇新聞與社論，藉以學習英文新聞與社論之慣用風格，語氣與各式，並比較中英文新聞寫作之表現差別。 除了既定每週實務翻譯外，視本班人數，學生將輪流做口頭報告至少一次，題目將涵蓋新聞寫作課本章節與相關短篇論文。

週次\*  
1. 課程介紹與翻譯練習2-3 短篇社會新聞  
4-5 短篇經濟新聞  
6-7 短篇政治新聞  
8 短篇商業細紋  
9-11 兩篇新聞合併編譯12-13 兩篇新聞合併編譯14-15 三篇新聞合併編譯16-18 社論翻譯
